amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the earmarking of grants made available through the Small Business Early-Stage Investment program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 111-317 to prohibit the earmarking of grants made available through the Small Business Early-Stage Investment program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 370 - 55 (Roll no. 828).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 370 - 55 (Roll no. 828).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Flake.
